They need government outreach, officials in Washington and Europe are all taking a closer look at Google, he said. Gillis said that the wider issue may stem from inside the company. to the current culture of government bailouts for corporations. When confronted with the news that the Big Three automakers will go under without government assistance, few can href="http://www.humanevents.com/article.php?id=28751"> respond better than Indiana congressman Mike Pence : Economic freedom means the freedom to succeed and the freedom to fail. Is it possible to critique the idea of the corporation while still advocating capitalism? While rarely happening, yes, in fact it is. And Douglas Rushkoff shows us how in his fascinating new book.

`` You know where his shirt is now,'' said Jay Leno .`` Burning on the driveway with the rest of his clothes.'' Noting other politicians involved in sex scandals, Jay Leno added that most Republicans are happy just to screw the poor. Now they are screwing everybody. David Letterman also checked in Thursday with some jokes aimed at Chris Lee . His show ran a clip that claimed to show John Boehner 's reaction. After Kyle Korver sent the game into a third overTim Cahille, Chris Webber delivered a clutch steal and secured the Philadelphia 76ers' 125-124 victory over the Celtics on Friday night. It was an amazing game, Sixers coach Maurice Cheeks said. Was it ever. Chris Webber had 31 points and 13 rebounds, Allen Iverson scored 33 points with 10 assists, and Samuel Dalembert had 20 points and 11 rebounds in the Sixers' longest game since
